org.apache.hadoop.hbase

接口 RegionMetrics

  • 所有已知实现类:
    RegionLoad

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public interface RegionMetrics
    Encapsulates per-region load metrics.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Size getBloomFilterSize() 
      long getCompactedCellCount() 
      long getCompactingCellCount() 
      long getCompletedSequenceId()
      This does not really belong inside RegionLoad but its being done in the name of expediency.
      float getDataLocality() 
      long getFilteredReadRequestCount() 
      long getLastMajorCompactionTimestamp() 
      Size getMemStoreSize() 
      default String getNameAsString() 
      long getReadRequestCount() 
      byte[] getRegionName() 
      default long getRequestCount() 
      int getStoreCount() 
      int getStoreFileCount() 
      Size getStoreFileIndexSize()
      TODO: why we pass the same value to different counters?
      Size getStoreFileRootLevelIndexSize() 
      Size getStoreFileSize() 
      Size getStoreFileUncompressedDataIndexSize() 
      Map<byte[],Long> getStoreSequenceId() 
      Size getUncompressedStoreFileSize() 
      long getWriteRequestCount() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRegionName

        byte[] getRegionName()
        返回:
        the region name

      • getStoreCount

        int getStoreCount()
        返回:
        the number of stores

      • getStoreFileCount

        int getStoreFileCount()
        返回:
        the number of storefiles

      • getStoreFileSize

        Size getStoreFileSize()
        返回:
        the total size of the storefiles

      • getMemStoreSize

        Size getMemStoreSize()
        返回:
        the memstore size

      • getReadRequestCount

        long getReadRequestCount()
        返回:
        the number of read requests made to region

      • getWriteRequestCount

        long getWriteRequestCount()
        返回:
        the number of write requests made to region

      • getRequestCount

        default long getRequestCount()
        返回:
        the number of write requests and read requests made to region

      • getNameAsString

        default String getNameAsString()
        返回:
        the region name as a string

      • getFilteredReadRequestCount

        long getFilteredReadRequestCount()
        返回:
        the number of filtered read requests made to region

      • getStoreFileIndexSize

        Size getStoreFileIndexSize()
        TODO: why we pass the same value to different counters? Currently, the value from getStoreFileIndexSize() is same with getStoreFileRootLevelIndexSize() see HRegionServer#createRegionLoad.
        返回:
        The current total size of root-level indexes for the region

      • getStoreFileRootLevelIndexSize

        Size getStoreFileRootLevelIndexSize()
        返回:
        The current total size of root-level indexes for the region

      • getStoreFileUncompressedDataIndexSize

        Size getStoreFileUncompressedDataIndexSize()
        返回:
        The total size of all index blocks, not just the root level

      • getBloomFilterSize

        Size getBloomFilterSize()
        返回:
        The total size of all Bloom filter blocks, not just loaded into the block cache

      • getCompactingCellCount

        long getCompactingCellCount()
        返回:
        the total number of cells in current compaction

      • getCompactedCellCount

        long getCompactedCellCount()
        返回:
        the number of already compacted kvs in current compaction

      • getCompletedSequenceId

        long getCompletedSequenceId()
        This does not really belong inside RegionLoad but its being done in the name of expediency.
        返回:
        the completed sequence Id for the region

      • getStoreSequenceId

        Map<byte[],Long> getStoreSequenceId()
        返回:
        completed sequence id per store.

      • getUncompressedStoreFileSize

        Size getUncompressedStoreFileSize()
        返回:
        the uncompressed size of the storefiles

      • getDataLocality

        float getDataLocality()
        返回:
        the data locality of region in the regionserver.

      • getLastMajorCompactionTimestamp

        long getLastMajorCompactionTimestamp()
        返回:
        the timestamp of the oldest hfile for any store of this region.
